content:
That's wonderful! It's great that you're supporting your friend Rachel's debut novel, and I'm sure she appreciated having you at her book launch event. It's always exciting to see friends achieve their publishing goals, and I'm sure you're proud of her accomplishment.

Attending book festivals and author readings can be incredibly inspiring, and it's fantastic that you're taking advantage of these opportunities. Hearing authors talk about their writing processes and experiences can be really insightful, and it's a great way to connect with them on a more personal level.

If you don't mind me asking, what was it like attending Rachel's book launch event? Was there anything in particular that stood out to you, such as a particular comment or anecdote she shared about her writing process?

Also, have you had a chance to read "The Art of Falling" yet? What are your thoughts on the book?
